"Good work in holding back these creatures..." he begins with a yellow smile. "However, I must warn ye... The town is now drawing some attention and..." He shivers for a moment. Otherwise, I will teach your herbalists a salve to treat their bites... But you must be fast! Be prepared, my friends!"

"My friends, I come with a warning!" He seems a bit shaken and tired, as if he has been running a long distance to bring this message. "Witches, evil ones. Hags wielding unnatural, dark magic... They too have been attracted by your town's prowess in defense of the weaker and good spirits. Their veil of darkness will protect their allies; remember to take them down as fast as possible!" He nods assertively before preparing to leave.

"I have returned with dire news once more, I'm afraid..." He pauses before continuing, looking for proper words. "Greater, otherworldly forces are now set on seeing your town burn! They will provide protection to some of the creatures that are coming to attack, a protection that will make them almost completely invulnerable! Luckily, White-fire Candledark Wards can break this terrible spell, so..." He looks around for a moment. "I guess it's time to invest in some."

"We did it, my friends!" He smiles, his crooked teeth shinier than ever. "We've done our part and most of the good and friendly spirits are now on their way home... There's only one thing left now..."

Starting the celebration will finish the Candledark event and the Soulfire Tree will no longer produce Soulfire. Additionally, the Herbalist can now create a Vial of Blessed Water, which will heal enthralled hearthlings, if any. Should you wish to continue, you can press [Esc] to close this message and delay the celebration for as long as you want!

"We will raise our tankards in celebration to honor them as they pass!"

msg1.bulletin_title: A spirit seems to approach Elbezar!

bulletin_message.00:
Elbezar's eyes seem fixated on the ghostly form in front of him. "I was hoping you'd be here... This town has done a wonderful job this year. I've longed for this brief moment for so long..."

A tear seems to roll down his face.

"Yes, my dear. They did a wonderful job indeed..." It frowns. "But it worries me so much that while we shall move on... You seem to linger. Every year, Elbezar... You say you worry I wouldn't move on but it is you that must let go, for yourself... What happened, happened. Time can't go back..."

"Yes, every year! I am so sorry, I really am! But I can't let you go... The guilt I carry, the mistakes I've made... I can never erase them. And I need to know you'll find your way back, every Candledark... Or I will never forgive myself!" He sobs.

"Your friends are right, Elbezar. We will always find our way, sooner or later. It is the natural order of things. We appreciate the warmth and the guiding, but we wouldn't be lost forever without it. So you must ask yourself if you're doing this for us... Or for yourself..."

He nods at the spirit's words, tears streaming down his face. "Thank you, all of you, for guiding us during the Candledark, and for the friendly interactions." The spirit giggles.

"Every year you mean to help me move on, my dear Elbezar, but I've already moved on. There's nothing to forgive, there's nothing to regret." The spirit seems to smile and radiate warmth and love.

"It's you that must move on now, my love. You've done your part. I'm at peace... You must be as well."

"Yes, my love. You are right..." Elbezar seems pensive for a moment. "I can't change the past, but I can move on to a better future. We must live fully and enjoy every moment with those we treasure, for all things pass." He tries to smile, still sobbing. "Thank you, my friends. I am sorry I've hidden my own selfish reasons for what I do, but I do not regret it.

We've done good for many this year, from both worlds, and perhaps this, after all, is a worthy endeavour in itself. Farewell, and may we meet again in the future!"

Order the Engineer to reload this turret with a Basket of Turnips.

The turret will continue to use Turnips as ammunition whenever it runs out as long as no new command is given.

pumpkin_ward_green.description:
Offer the boon of a üîπBasket of Garlic to the good spirits of Candledark to receive the green Soulfire blessing on this Ward.

‚ùáÔ∏è This Ward will enfeeble Vampires within its range, reducing their attributes and preventing them from being able to infect hearthlings with their bites, greatly reducing the risk of being turned into a Thrall.

‚ö†Ô∏è After transformed, the Candledark Ward can no longer be moved or undeployed and can only be destroyed.

pumpkin_ward_orange.description:
Offer the boon of a üîπBasket of Pumpkin to the good spirits of Candledark to receive the orange Soulfire blessing on this Ward.

‚ùáÔ∏è This Ward will be able to shoot enemies, like a turret. The damage is medium and the range is short but the shooting speed is quite high! They regain 5 rounds of ammunition every one hour.

‚ö†Ô∏è After transformed, the Candledark Ward can no longer be moved or undeployed and can only be destroyed.

pumpkin_ward_purple.description:
Offer the boon of a üîπSkull to the good spirits of Candledark to receive the purple Soulfire blessing on this Ward.

‚ùáÔ∏è This Ward will be able to severely slow down every Candledark enemy that walks within its range.

‚ö†Ô∏è After transformed, the Candledark Ward can no longer be moved or undeployed and can only be destroyed.

pumpkin_ward_red.description:
Offer the boon of a üîπHealing Tonic to the good spirits of Candledark to receive the red Soulfire blessing on this Ward.

‚ùáÔ∏è This Ward will continue to just hurt Candledark enemies over time, however the frequency of the pulses and the damage inflicted will be much higher.

‚ö†Ô∏è After transformed, the Candledark Ward can no longer be moved or undeployed and can only be destroyed.

pumpkin_ward_white.description:
Offer the boon of üîπGold Flakes to the good spirits of Candledark to receive the white Soulfire blessing on this Ward.

‚ùáÔ∏è This Ward will be able to remove the 'Otherwordly Protection' buff from Candledark enemies that have it, leaving them a lot more vulnerable.

‚ö†Ô∏è After transformed, the Candledark Ward can no longer be moved or undeployed and can only be destroyed.

pumpkin_ward_yellow.description:
Offer the boon of a üîπBig Bone Material to the good spirits of Candledark to receive the yellow Soulfire blessing on this Ward.

‚ùáÔ∏è This Ward shall be able to weaken Candledark enemies that walk within its range, drastically reducing the damage they inflict on your citizens.

‚ö†Ô∏è After transformed, the Candledark Ward can no longer be moved or undeployed and can only be destroyed.

green_aura_buff.description:
Will inflict approaching Candledark Vampire enemies with the green Ward effect.
  • The Muscle, Menace, Courage and Speed of Vampires are reduced
  • Vampires can't fly anymore and can be affected by the 'Shaken' and 'Flanked' effects
  • The damage and the armor of Vampires are reduced

green_effect_buff.description:
This creature is affected by a Candledark Ward!
  • Muscle, Menace, Courage and Speed are reduced
  • Can no longer bite or fly and can now be affected by the 'Shaken' and 'Flanked' effects
  • Damage and armor are reduced
  • The Vampire shall regain their strength if they leave the Ward's influence, keep them close!

purple_aura_buff.description:
Will inflict approaching Candledark enemies with the purple Ward effect.
  • The Speed of enemies is reduced
  • The ward effect becomes stronger as it stacks

red_aura_buff.description:
Will inflict approaching Candledark enemies with the red Ward effect.
  • Enemies take a reasonable amount of damage while inflicted with the ward
  • The ward effect becomes stronger as it stacks

soulfire_aura_buff.description:
Will inflict approaching Candledark enemies with the Soulfire Ward effect.
  • Enemies take a small amount of damage while inflicted with the ward

white_aura_buff.description:
Will inflict approaching Candledark enemies with the white Ward effect.
  • Enemies protected by the 'Otherworldly Protection' effect will lose it
  • The protection will not come back to them even after they've left the ward radius

yellow_aura_buff.description:
Will inflict approaching Candledark enemies with the yellow Ward effect.
  • The damage of enemies is reduced
  • The ward effect becomes stronger as it stacks

purple_effect_buff.description:
This creature is affected by a Candledark Ward!
  • Speed is reduced
  • This effect becomes stronger as it stacks

red_effect_buff.description:
This creature is affected by a Candledark Ward!
  • Taking a reasonable amount of damage over time
  • This effect becomes stronger as it stacks

soulfire_effect_buff.description:
This creature is affected by a Candledark Ward!
  • Taking a small amount of damage over time

white_effect_buff.description:
This creature is affected by a Candledark Ward!
  • Prevents this creature from being protected by 'Otherworldly Protection'
  • The protection will not come back even after this effect expires

yellow_effect_buff.description:
This creature is affected by a Candledark Ward!
  • Damage is reduced
  • This effect becomes stronger as it stacks

This creature seems to be reciting some ancient, mystical words!
  • Defeat this creature to stop the Shroud of Darkness from protecting the others around it

darkness_effect_buff.description:
It's like they're phasing between worlds!
  • Invulnerable to all sources of damage
  • Invulnerable to Candledark Wards' effects except the white Ward
  • One of their allies must be calling upon the Dark Shroud to grant this protection. Locate them!

  • Invulnerable to Candledark Wards' effects except the white Ward, which removes this protection

bat_power.description:
Oof! That bat created some really terrible noise towards me!
  • Courage is completely reduced for a few minutes

  • Diligence, Compassion, Willpower, Stamina and Speed are reduced
  • This hearthling needs to be treated with Garlic & Nightshade Salve to prevent them from becoming a Vampire Thrall when the timer expires!

This hearthling has been turned into a Vampire Thrall! The Soulfire Tree shall keep them from losing their minds, but...
  • Most attributes are completely reduced
  • A cure exists but may only be obtained towards the end of the Candledark event!

nibbles.description:
Ouch! Owie! There's a Vampire trying to bite me!
  • If repeated bites are successful, this Hearthling might be enthralled!

ghost.description:
So much fog! It seems to go wherever I go!
  • Speed is reduced

cat.description:
Cats are so agile, they can be anywhere! Gotta be careful!

  • This hearthling will prioritize dancing above everything else, literally

vampire.description:
I feel so... Drained. What's going on?
